ADMIN_MENU_PLAYERS_HELP: Select a player (or players) and a command to run.
NAME: Name
OPEN_IN_STEAM_OVERLAY_DESCRIPTION: Open this page in the Steam overlay? (If you choose always, type "sh_viewwebinsteam 0" in the console to get this window back)
REST_OF_MAP: the duration of the current map.
DISABLE_WEB_DESCRIPTION: Disable web page display from plugins.
VIEW_WEB_IN_STEAM_DESCRIPTION: View web pages in the Steam overlay.
REPORT_ERRORS_DESCRIPTION: Report script errors caused by Shine.
ERROR_CANT_TARGET_SELF: You cannot target yourself with this command.
ERROR_CANT_TARGET: You do not have permission to target {PlayerName}.
ERROR_CANT_TARGET_MULTIPLE: You do not have permission to target anyone you specified.
COMMAND_RESTRICTED_ARG: Invalid argument #{ArgNum}, restricted in rank settings.
COMMAND_NO_PERMISSION: You do not have permission to use {CommandName}.
SYSTEM_NOTIFICATIONS_OK: No errors or warnings to report.
SYSTEM_NOTIFICATIONS_ACCESS_DENIED: You do not have access to view system notifications.
SYSTEM_NOTIFICATIONS_WARNINGS_NOTIFICATI: Warnings occurred during Shine startup. Check the admin menu status tab for details.
SYSTEM_NOTIFICATIONS_ERRORS_NOTIFICATION: Errors occurred during Shine startup. Check the admin menu status tab for details.
ERROR_INVALID_JSON_IN_BASE_CONFIG: The base configuration file has invalid JSON: {Context}
WARNING_PLUGIN_CONFIG_VALIDATION_ERRORS: Provided configuration had validation errors which have been corrected.
WARNING_UNREGISTERED_PLUGINS: Some plugins failed to load as they have not been registered: {Context}
